title: Kauas √∂isen taivaan alla
english_title: Far away under the starry sky
content_vision: The lyrics could paint a narrative of a young kid who dreams big and refuses to be boxed by traditional roles or expectations. Verses might detail their imaginative adventures and the different roles they play‚Äîfrom astronaut to artist‚Äîunderscoring the message that you can be anything you want to be. This would not only resonate with the visuals involving a child but also encapsulate the essence of freedom and celebrating one's uniqueness as specified by the client.
